GSD.description:
video: fbdev: nvidiafb: Use strscpy() to prevent buffer overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 41baa86b6c802cdc6ab8ff2d46c083c9be93de81. For more details please see the references link.
